channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 14:38 Air alarm to the Donetsk region follow the following messages.
item.description: 🔴 14:38 Air alarm to the Donetsk region follow the following messages.#Donetsk_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
